title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When the default value is modified in the Edit Parameter dialog for a report parameter with display type set to List Box, the modified default value is not retained when reopening the Edit Parameter dialog.
EB: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter should be retained even after modifying the default value in the Edit Parameter dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK without making any other changes. 
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
